title: Wuthering Waves Premiere Teaser
desc: Beyond the horizon, the world of Wuthering Waves is rising.

title: Wuthering Waves CG Trailer | Daybreak
desc: From the ashes of annihilation, a new age is born. With that, the cycle of doom is back in motion.

title: Wuthering Waves Gameplay Trailer
desc: Explore where your heart takes you. Slay Calamons with your Niellore blade. End the cycle of calamity. *The game is still in the early stage of development, so graphic qualities might not be ideal.

title: Gameplay Demo | Suonare
desc: Waking up at ebb tide, you set out on the journey with the wind. Calamons wuther and the concerto of chords continues. In this fragmented world we look forward to hearing the echo again.

title: Wuthering Waves X Tokyo Game Show 2022 Announced
desc: Dear Rovers, Niellores come from shattered rocks, and homeland falls into Calament. Wuthering Waves is going to attend the 2022 Tokyo Game Show!

title: Wuthering Waves Exhibition Gameplay Trailer | 2022 Tokyo Game Show
desc: Dear Rovers, In the sorrows of living creatures, with black feathers fluttering, raven flies through the wild forest and stones, going to the distant place in the ebb and flow. Wuthering Waves is now attending the 2022 Tokyo Game Show! *The game is currently under development. The content doesn't represent the final quality.

title: Wuthering Waves · Dev Talk · Prelude EP. 1 - The Intro
desc: Dear Rovers, Introducing "Wuthering Waves · Dev Talk · Prelude". A series where we give you an insight into Wuthering Waves' development and some glances behind the scenes. Our first episode will include a General Introduction of Wuthering Waves, its Development Process, and our future Plans, to help our players learn and understand Wuthering Waves from various perspectives. Heed the Prelude.

title: Wuthering Waves · Dev Talk · Prelude EP. 2 - Combat System
desc: Dear Rovers, Many of you may be eager to find out how combat is presented within the game. In "Wuthering Waves · Dev Talk · Prelude" - EP. 2, we will be taking a closer look at the Combat System, from Basic Controls to its Core Mechanics. Heed the Prelude.

title: Wuthering Waves · Dev Talk · Prelude EP.3 - Art Design
desc: Dear Rovers, This episode of "Wuthering Waves · Dev Talk · Prelude" - EP. 3, we take a dive into the mindset of our Art Designers and learn, to present a world unique in its own, how their inspirations for Art Styles, Scenic Designs, and Item Designs gradually came into fruition. Heed the Prelude.

title: Wuthering Waves · Dev Talk · Prelude EP. 4 - Echo System
desc: Dear Rovers, As a key component during combat, the "Echo System" plays an essential role towards players' success and survival. "Wuthering Waves · Dev Talk · Prelude" - EP. 4 brings the Design Concept of the Echo System and how it is operated. Heed the Prelude.

title: Wuthering Waves | Closed Beta Test Teaser
desc: We suffer, from the pain and disorder. Yet the blossoms, the most vibrant flower; it is the child of chaos in the final light. Closed Beta Test Registration, initiating tomorrow.
name: Aalto

title: Wuthering Waves | Resonator Showcase | Danjin — A WAYFARER'S ESCAPADE
desc: Adorned with jade, dispelling fear... bringing hope near.
name: Danjin

title: Wuthering Waves — Closed Beta II Gameplay Trailer | Awakening: A World Reborn
desc: Wuthering Waves CBT2 Recruitment is now open! Rise and set forth on your new journey, Rover.

title: Devs Interview: What We've Been Doing During the Past 9 Months
desc: Before the start of CBT2, we would like to share our progress in the past 9 months. As always, we remain attentive to your voice.
